partialIncidentDTO Data Type

This object contains a minimal subset of the incident data. It is useful for displaying in a list.

Namespace
(Default)
Properties
name data type type namespace min/max occurs description
create_date dateTime element 0/1 The date the incident was created.
description textContentDTO element 0/1 The description of the incident.
discovered_date dateTime element 0/1 The date the incident was discovered. This is a required field and has significant implications for privacy-related incidents. Many of the tasks that get generated will have their due dates set based on this date.
due_date dateTime element 0/1 The earliest due date of any incident task.
id int element 0/1 The incident ID.
inc_training boolean element 0/1 true if this is a training incident (aka simulation). false indicates that it is a normal incident.
name string element 0/1 The name of the incident.
owner_id objectHandle element 0/1 The ID of the incident owner.

The list of all available users is in the fullOrgDTO (users property).
phase_id objectHandle element 0/1 The ID of phase the incident is currently in (e.g. Engage, Detect/Analyze, Respond, Post-Incident).

The possible values are available in the fullOrgDTO (phases property).
plan_status string element 0/1 The incident status.

The possible values with their names are available in constDTO (incident_statuses property).
severity_code objectHandle element 0/1 The incident's severity.

Example

<partialIncidentDTO>
  <id>...</id>
  <name>...</name>
  <discovered_date>...</discovered_date>
  <due_date>...</due_date>
  <create_date>...</create_date>
  <description>
    <format>...</format>
    <content>...</content>
  </description>
  <owner_id>
    <id>...</id>
    <name>...</name>
  </owner_id>
  <phase_id>
    <id>...</id>
    <name>...</name>
  </phase_id>
  <severity_code>
    <id>...</id>
    <name>...</name>
  </severity_code>
  <plan_status>...</plan_status>
  <inc_training>...</inc_training>
</partialIncidentDTO>
